content.heading: Enjoy the additional benefits available with your ufirst Private account
content.content:
With a ufirst Private account from Ulster Bank you can enjoy multi trip worldwide travel insurance for you and your family, mobile phone cover, 15% cash back on ticket booking, worldwide airport lounge access, an interest-free arranged overdraft buffer and a preferential arranged overdraft rate*. If you close or downgrade your ufirst Private account you will no longer be entitled to the benefits.

*You need to apply for the interest-free arranged overdraft buffer

benefit.title: Annual Worldwide Family Travel Insurance
benefit.content: Going on holiday? Enjoy worldwide travel with annual cover for trips of up to 31 days. This also includes up to 17 days per year for winter sports cover.

benefit.title: Mobile Phone Insurance
benefit.content: Your mobile is covered against loss, theft, unauthorised calls, damage or breakdown, wherever you are in the world.

benefit.title: Ticket Booking
benefit.content: Enjoy 15% cash back on tickets for the theatre, dance, opera, concert performances, sporting events and more.

benefit.title: Interest-free arranged Overdraft buffer
benefit.content: Like some extra breathing space for your finances or need some extra money before payday? You can apply for an interest free arranged overdraft buffer of up to Â£500

benefit.title: Airport Lounge Access
benefit.content: Wherever you're traveling, being able to use the airport lounge is always a bonus - before a flight or in transit.

benefit.title: Preferential Arranged Overdraft Interest Rate
benefit.content: A preferential arranged overdraft interest rate is available on your account.

benefitBlocks.heading: Manage your sign in details
benefitBlocks.blockText: This is where you can change your personal details or password.

benefitBlocks.heading: View your past interactions with your benefits
